# SAM AI Documentation

> SAM AI is an AI-powered business automation platform built on Odoo 18.

Base URL: https://ai-sam-ai.github.io

---

## How to Navigate (For AI Agents)

SAM AI uses a **four-file documentation standard** per module:

| File | Purpose | When to Fetch |
|------|---------|---------------|
| `_META.md` | Agent routing, context, cross-references | **First** - start here |
| `_SCHEMA.md` | Technical specs, models, API endpoints | Need code details |
| `_WOW.md` | Benefits, use cases (non-technical) | Need sales/marketing context |
| `_FAQ.md` | Q&A format, troubleshooting | Specific questions |

**Navigation pattern:**
```
llms.txt → {module}_META.md → SCHEMA/WOW/FAQ as needed
```

---

## Core Modules (Start Here)

| Module | META File | Purpose |
|--------|-----------|---------|
| ai_sam | [ai_sam_META.md](docs/04_modules/ai_sam/ai_sam_META.md) | Chat UI, frontend layer |
| ai_sam_base | [ai_sam_base_META.md](docs/04_modules/ai_sam_base/ai_sam_base_META.md) | Backend, models, API, controllers |
| ai_sam_workflows | [ai_sam_workflows_META.md](docs/04_modules/ai_sam_workflows/ai_sam_workflows_META.md) | N8N-style workflow automation |
| ai_sam_cache_manager | [ai_sam_cache_manager_META.md](docs/04_modules/ai_sam_cache_manager/ai_sam_cache_manager_META.md) | Caching infrastructure |

---

## Architecture (How It Works)

| Topic | Entry Point |
|-------|-------------|
| Chat Message Flow | [chat_message_flow_DIAGRAM.md](docs/05_how_sam_works/chat_message_flow/chat_message_flow_DIAGRAM.md) |
| API Infrastructure | [sam_ai_api_infrastructure/](docs/05_how_sam_works/sam_ai_api_infrastructure/) |
| Core Architecture | [ARCHITECTURE.md](docs/05_how_sam_works/core/ARCHITECTURE.md) |
| Database Schema | [SAM_AI_V3_DATABASE_SCHEMA.md](docs/05_how_sam_works/database/SAM_AI_V3_DATABASE_SCHEMA.md) |

---

## All Modules

[docs/04_modules/](docs/04_modules/) - Full index of 18+ modules

Each module folder contains the four-file standard:
- `{module}_META.md` - Start here
- `{module}_SCHEMA.md` - Technical details
- `{module}_WOW.md` - Benefits (non-technical)
- `{module}_FAQ.md` - Q&A format

---

## Quick Reference

| I need... | Fetch... |
|-----------|----------|
| Chat UI structure | [ai_sam_META.md](docs/04_modules/ai_sam/ai_sam_META.md) → SCHEMA |
| Backend API endpoints | [ai_sam_base_META.md](docs/04_modules/ai_sam_base/ai_sam_base_META.md) → SCHEMA |
| Workflow automation | [ai_sam_workflows_META.md](docs/04_modules/ai_sam_workflows/ai_sam_workflows_META.md) |
| How chat messages flow | [chat_message_flow_DIAGRAM.md](docs/05_how_sam_works/chat_message_flow/chat_message_flow_DIAGRAM.md) |
| Database tables | [SAM_AI_V3_DATABASE_SCHEMA.md](docs/05_how_sam_works/database/SAM_AI_V3_DATABASE_SCHEMA.md) |
